# collect loose nodes and sort them out

- concept of `collect loose nodes and sort them out`

```

for n in $(ls zet); do
  ./zc refs $n
done

awk '
BEGIN { id = "BEGIN" }
/REFSFOR/ {
  print id, total
  id = $2
  total = 0
  next
}
{ total++ }
' allrefs

```
